attributes.action: To stop postal vote fraud in the uk referendum
attributes.background: Postal voting fraud has become “easy” because of “extremely lax rules”, the electoral commissioner has said amid concerns that the practice is widespread.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition as it does not call for a clear action from the UK Government and Parliament. You might be interested in signing the following petition on abandoning postal voting https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/114700

Or you could start a petition suggesting ways to reduce fraud in postal voting.

You'll need to give your full name to start a petition.
